thread.section_title: iTunesCardDelivery Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of iTunesCardDelivery | www.itunescarddelivery.com
thread.title: Paul Sanderson

author: Paul Sanderson
title: Paul Sanderson
text: The first code I was given didn't work - I got an error that it had already been redeemed. It took a while to follow the steps to contact Apple and show it really was a code which had already been used, but when I did everything, iTunes Card Delivery sent me a replacement code which did work. Thanks - I'll recommend your service to others!
